short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random passwords based on user-defined properties.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Random Password Generator is a Chrome extension designed to help users create strong and secure passwords with ease. It offers a customizable password generation process, allowing users to select password lengths between 4 and 32 characters. 

The extension provides four different character categories to include in the passwords:
1.	Uppercase Letters: Incorporate capital letters from A to Z.
2.	Lowercase Letters: Include lowercase letters from a to z.
3.	Numbers: Add numerical digits from 0 to 9.
4.	Special Characters: Insert symbols like !, @, #, $, %, and more.

Key Features:
•	Customizable Character Selection: Users can choose any combination of the four character categories to meet specific security requirements or personal preferences.
•	True Randomness Source: Passwords are generated using a true randomness source, ensuring high entropy and making them highly secure against hacking attempts.
•	Session Persistence: The extension securely stores generated passwords in the background, allowing users to access and reuse them across different browsing sessions without needing to regenerate them.
•	User-Friendly Interface: A simple and intuitive design makes it easy for users of all levels to generate strong passwords quickly.
•	Secure Storage: Passwords are stored securely within the extension to prevent unauthorized access and ensure user privacy.

This Chrome extension is an essential tool for enhancing online security by providing strong, unique passwords for all your accounts. It simplifies the process of creating complex passwords, encouraging better password practices and reducing the risk of unauthorized account access
